- [Offisielt frå statsrådet](offisielt_fra_s.rad_raw_2025-01-08.RDS){target="_blank"}: A dataset containing the text from the minutes from Council of State (1994--2025). Extracted from: https://www.regjeringen.no/no/aktuelt/offisielt-fra-statsrad/offisielt-fra-statsrad1/id30297/
- [Etatslederutnevnelser](etatsledere_1990-2021.xlsx){target="_blank"}: A dataset containing all agency heads appointed in the Council of State (1994--2021)
- [Senior Bureaucrats in Norwegian Ministries](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/IUXUPR){target="_blank"}: Data on All Level 1 and Level 2 Bureaucrats (Ekspedisjonssjefer, Assisterende Departementsråder and Departementsråder) and cabinet ministers, state secretaries, and political advisors in the ministries (1884-2024).
- [Etater](Norge_underliggende_virksomheter_1814-2024.xlsx){target="_blank"}: Dataset containing informaton about all Norwegian Agencies until 2024. Extracted from https://forvaltningsdatabasen.sikt.no/
